definition: see 巨牙鯊|巨牙鲨[ju4 ya2 sha1]
man-eating shark/same as 大白鯊|大白鲨[da4 bai2 sha1], great white shark (Carcharodon carcharias)

sentences.english: Luckily for you, GDI also comes equipped with Hammerheads.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，GDI还配有锤头鲨。

sentences.english: Para-Medic: I see you've caught yourself a maroon shark.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你捉了一条栗鲨。

sentences.english: The hammerhead shark family is a good example.
sentences.chinese: 双髻鲨家族是一个好的例子。

sentences.english: It established a method by HPLC fingerprint in the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次建立了鲨芪康胶囊的高效液相色谱指纹图谱。

sentences.english: Gas Skunk : You can scratch yourself now, Sky-Byte.
sentences.chinese: 你现在可以自己抓痒了，天鲨。

sentences.english: The group also reported the dusky and sandbar sharks as being threatened.
sentences.chinese: 该组织还报告了灰鲨和沙洲鲨也正受到威胁。

sentences.english: The group also reported the dusky and sandbar sharks as being threatened.
sentences.chinese: 该组织还报告了灰鲨和沙洲鲨也正受到威胁。

sentences.english: Gonad histological structure of Labeo erythrurus Fowler (rainbow shark) was studied by optical microscope.
sentences.chinese: 对繁殖季节彩虹鲨卵巢的结构进行显微观察。

sentences.english: A sand tiger shark off the Bonin Islands will soon give birth.
sentences.chinese: 小笠原群岛外，一只虎头鲨即将产仔。

sentences.english: I jumped into the water and I was surrounded by reef sharks and red snappers.
sentences.chinese: 我跳入水中，四周环游着珊瑚礁鲨和红甲鱼。

sentences.english: The most aggressive type of shark is the bull shark.
sentences.chinese: 最具攻击性的鲨鱼种类是牛鲨。

sentences.english: Other species such as blacktip reef sharks did not show this behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 其他种类，如黑鳍礁鲨就没有这种能力。

sentences.english: A whitetip reef shark cruises over Great Detached Reef.
sentences.chinese: 一只白鳍鲨在大离礁海域巡游。

sentences.english: This product used shark liver oil as raw materials. It has function ingredients which called shark.
sentences.chinese: 本品以鲨鱼肝油为主要原料，含有功效成份角鲨烯。

sentences.english: It is a haven for  hammerhead and  white tip sharks, as well as  manta  rays.
sentences.chinese: 对于第鲨鱼和白尖鲨，以及蝠𫚉，这是一个避难所。

sentences.english: But they did not come as the Mako had come.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们来的方式和那条灰鲭鲨的不同。

definition: variant of 劍魚|剑鱼[jian4 yu2]
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
man-eating shark/same as 大白鯊|大白鲨[da4 bai2 sha1], great white shark (Carcharodon carcharias)
skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae)/ray (fish)
